name: FearFight
description:
A Levantar Studio Production

Story

Every night Isabella fights with zombies in her dreams which she fears the most. Each night she loses. Whenever zombie approaches, she starts to panic and freezes. 

"I know its just a dream but it feels so real. 

Its like my bones are shivering when a zombie approaches." -Isabella

Today she is determined to fight her fear in her dreams  and this time she is not going to STOP until she sees the end of this

Instructions

Move Forward - W

Move Backward - S

Move Right - D

Move Left - A

Attack - Left Mouse Button

Power Attack - Right Mouse Button (3x)

Interact - F

Heal - 1

PowerUp Potion - 2

Pause - Escape

***You have to find 2 keys to open the gate and kill the horde master

There are potions to fill the power level, medikit to heal yourself

Continuous clicking of the right mouse button will result in a combo

the RED bar is your health

BLUE bar is your power level***

*Musics were taken from PurplePlanet and freesound.org

*Animations and characters were from Mixamo

*The rest of the assets are made within the timeline of the game jam by the developers.
